Constant.name: a
Constant.description: Coefficient of the cubic term in the first state-variable.

Constant.name: b
Constant.description: Coefficient of the squared term in the first state-variable.

Constant.name: c
Constant.description: Additive coefficient for the second state-variable x_{2}, called :math:`y_{0}` in Jirsa paper.

Constant.name: d
Constant.description: Coefficient of the squared term in the second state-variable x_{2}.

Constant.name: r
Constant.description: Temporal scaling in the slow state-variable, called :math:`1\\tau_{0}` in Jirsa paper (see class Epileptor).

Constant.name: s
Constant.description: Linear coefficient in the third state variable

Constant.name: Iext
Constant.description: External input current to the first state-variable.

Constant.name: slope
Constant.description: Linear coefficient in the first state-variable.

Constant.name: Iext2
Constant.description: External input current to the first state-variable.

Constant.name: tau
Constant.description: Temporal scaling coefficient in fifth state variable.

Constant.name: aa
Constant.description: Linear coefficient in fifth state variable.

Constant.name: bb
Constant.description: Linear coefficient of lowpass excitatory coupling in fourth state variable.

Constant.name: Kvf
Constant.description: Coupling scaling on a very fast time scale.

Constant.name: Kf
Constant.description: Correspond to the coupling scaling on a fast time scale.

Constant.name: Ks
Constant.description: Permittivity coupling, that is from the fast time scale toward the slow time scale.

Constant.name: tt
Constant.description: Time scaling of the whole system to the system in real time.

Constant.name: modification
Constant.description: When modification is True, then use nonlinear influence on z. The default default is False, i.e., linear influence.

ConditionalDerivedVariable.name: ydot0
ConditionalDerivedVariable.cases: -a * powf(x1, 2) + b * x1; slope - x2 + 0.6 * powf((z - 4),2)

TimeDerivative.name: x1
TimeDerivative.expression: tt * (y1 - z + Iext + Kvf * c_pop1 + ydot0 )

TimeDerivative.name: x2
TimeDerivative.expression: tt * (-y2 + x2 - powf(x2, 3) + Iext2 + bb * g - 0.3 * (z - 3.5) + Kf * c_pop2)

DerivedVariable.name: pre
DerivedVariable.description: pre synaptic function for coupling activity
